Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Interactive Astrological Grid

- Implement 12-area grid with SVG shapes \(triangles, squares, rectangles\)
- Add fixed center area displaying ''M''
- Implement hover highlights and click interactions
- Add letter picker \(A-Z\) using shadcn/ui Popover
- Display area ID numbers in each shape
- Setup Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components
- Add dark mode support
- Responsive design with React 19.2 + TypeScript + Vite

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Standardize square areas and update center display

- Make areas 0, 1, 4, 7, and 10 all the same size \(100x100 squares\)
- Change area 1 from rectangle to square
- Change area 7 from rectangle to square
- Update center area \(0\) to display ''0'' instead of ''M''
- Adjust positioning for proper grid alignment
- All square areas now uniformly sized at 100x100

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
